product_name: Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Deluxe Money Belt
long_description: The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Deluxe Money Belt combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded microchips. Special technology helps block unauthorized scanning of RFID (radio frequency identification) chips inside passports and credit and debit cards. The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Deluxe Money Belt includes 2 zippered pockets to organize your travel essentials: passport, currency, ID cards, credit cards and itineraries. Slip pocket on back stores waist strap when you're not wearing the belt. Durable and lightweight nylon ripstop with moisture-wicking and breathable back panel.
short_description: The Eagle Creek RFID Blocker Deluxe Money Belt combats potential ID theft by blocking access to personal data stored on embedded microchips.
